name: MAGIX (demo)
description:
In MAGIX, all combat is through magic, in this demo, the duels game mode is displayed, there are 6 levels, which become more difficult as you continue 

MAGIX, is a magic only combat game I am making, this is currently my main and only project, so updates should hopefully come at a smooth pace.

CONTROLS: 1 = primary magic attack, 2 = secondary magic attack (area of affect) 

there are descriptions in the game in the duels section and the campaign section, which elaborate further on the game for those who want to know more about the story and duels 

multiplayer and tournament mode I have not decided much on yet  

thank you for playing and downloading, or just taking the time to read this description (:

lemme know what you think (:
